title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1274.8 - Loading or unloading passengers by vehicles for hire restricted
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1274.8 - Loading or unloading passengers by vehicles for hire restricted

State Regulations

No vehicle for hire shall load or unload passengers at
the air terminal at any place other than that designated by the
manager. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
1274.8

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
